summary: A comprehensive test suite for the Open Library core package, containing pytest fixtures, mock objects, and unit tests that verify utilities such as caching, connections, helpers, internationalization, IA metadata retrieval, initialization, lending, list processing, data models, markdown rendering, URL processing, cache invalidation, rating calculations, sponsorship logic, vendor data handling, and waitingâ€‘list behavior.
business_intent: Ensure the core components of the Open Library platform function correctly and remain stable during development and deployment by automatically detecting regressions and validating expected behavior across a wide range of features.
